Class LoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.mancas.educacity.LoginActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class LoginActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    Activity which displays a login screen to the user, offering registration as well.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Manuel Casas Barrado

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LoginActivity.UserLoginTask
      Represents an asynchronous login task used to authenticate the user.

      • attemptLogin

        public void attemptLogin()
        Attempts to sign in the account specified by the login form. If there are form errors (invalid email, missing fields, etc.), the errors are presented and no actual login attempt is made.
